japanese: それは危ないと思う。
english: I think that's dangerous.

japanese: トムはボストン訪問中なんでしょ？
english: Tom is visiting Boston, isn't he?

japanese: トムはしょげてしまうかもしれないな。
english: Tom could be depressed.

japanese: トムは三日前に来たよ。
english: Tom came three days ago.

japanese: 八つ当たりするつもりはなかったのよ。
english: I didn't mean to take it out on you.

japanese: 君に当たるつもりはなかったんだ。
english: I didn't mean to take it out on you.

japanese: トムなら電話でできるでしょ。
english: Tom could do that by phone.

japanese: ホテルの前で一人で待ってたのよ。
english: I waited by myself in front of the hotel.

japanese: トムはメアリーに脅迫されていた。
english: Tom was blackmailed by Mary.

japanese: ギリシャ語って、難しいな。
english: The Greek language is difficult.

japanese: 幽霊は、どこにでもいるさ。
english: There are ghosts everywhere.

japanese: 暴力はどこにでもある。
english: There's violence everywhere.

japanese: この車、高いんだろうな。
english: This car is probably expensive.

japanese: トムはあなたに嘘をつく気はないんだよ。
english: Tom isn't going to lie to you.

japanese: トムは君に嘘をつくつもりはないんだ。
english: Tom isn't going to lie to you.

japanese: 毎日電話するよ。
english: I'm going to call you every day.

japanese: トムってスキーのインストラクターなんだよね？
english: Tom is a ski instructor, isn't he?

japanese: 昨日テーブルのここに置いといたノートって、どこにある？
english: Where is the notebook that I left here on the table yesterday?

japanese: 人々は明らかに飽き飽きしている。
english: People are clearly fed up.

japanese: ごめん、言いたいことがわからないんだけど。
english: Sorry, I don't get your point.

japanese: で、金はどうなったの？
english: So, what happened with the money?

japanese: どうしていつもそんなにオシャレしてるの？
english: Why are you always so dressed up?

japanese: トムって、幽霊が怖いんでしょ？
english: Tom is afraid of ghosts, isn't he?

japanese: 本当にトムは独身だと思う？
english: Do you really think that Tom is single?

japanese: トムが言うことなんか信じちゃダメだよ。
english: Don't believe a word Tom says.

japanese: トムの言葉は信じるな。
english: Don't believe a word Tom says.

japanese: そのスカート、すごくよく似合ってるよ。
english: That skirt looks very nice on you.

japanese: そのスカート、とても似合ってるわ。
english: That skirt looks very nice on you.

japanese: どうして、そんなことになったの？
english: How did it come to this?

japanese: 妻は2013年に亡くなりました。
english: My wife died in 2013.

japanese: 家内は2013年に亡くなりました。
english: My wife died in 2013.

japanese: トムはメアリーがいない方がいいのかな？
english: Is Tom better off without Mary?

japanese: トムは人質のうちの１人を殺害した。
english: Tom killed one of his hostages.

japanese: これはボストン行きの電車ですか？
english: Is this the train for Boston?

japanese: もう二度とそんなことするなよ。
english: Never ever do that again.

japanese: トムは仕事に夢中のようだ。
english: Tom seems absorbed in his work.

japanese: トムは仕事に没頭してるみたい。
english: Tom seems absorbed in his work.

japanese: 翌朝トムが現れた。
english: Tom showed up the next morning.

japanese: それはとても面白いね？
english: It's very interesting, isn't it?

japanese: トムがやるんだから、僕もやるよ。
english: Since Tom will do that, I'll do that, too.

japanese: トムは万年筆で書くよ。
english: Tom writes with a fountain pen.

japanese: トムはあと30分で着く。
english: Tom is only thirty minutes away.

japanese: トムは30分くらい離れたところにいる。
english: Tom is only thirty minutes away.

japanese: トムは、友達と遊んでるよ。
english: Tom is playing with his friends.

japanese: トムはロマンチックではないけど、メアリーはロマンチックだ。
english: Tom isn't romantic, but Mary is.

japanese: トムは住宅街で暮らしていた。
english: Tom lived in a residential area.

japanese: トムは住宅街に住んでいます。
english: Tom lives in a residential area.

japanese: トムは３歳の時には字を読むことができた。
english: Tom could read when he was three.

japanese: ガソリンランプがついてから、どれくらい走れるの？
english: How far can you drive your car on empty?

japanese: トムはもうすぐ泣き止むよ。
english: Tom is going to stop crying soon.

japanese: トムは毎朝、フランス語を教えてるんだ。
english: Tom teaches French every morning.

japanese: ハゲている男性をセクシーだと思う女性もいます。
english: Some women think bald-headed men are sexy.

japanese: このゲームで遊ぼう。
english: Let's play this game.

japanese: フランスは好きですか？
english: Do you like France?

japanese: みんな、来年を楽しみにしています。
english: Everyone is looking forward to next year.

japanese: 本当にトムは意地悪だと思うの？
english: Do you really think Tom is mean?

japanese: トムはこの一家の稼ぎ手です。
english: Tom is the breadwinner in this family.

japanese: トムはこの家の大黒柱です。
english: Tom is the breadwinner in this family.

japanese: トムは我が子を失いたくなかったんだ。
english: Tom didn't want to lose his children.

japanese: トムって、何でも知ってるかのような口振りだったよ。
english: Tom talked as if he knew everything.

japanese: トムは昔ほど怖くはないわよ。
english: Tom isn't as scary as he used to be.

japanese: 本当にトムが食べたの？
english: Are you sure Tom ate?

japanese: トムは失礼にはならないでしょう。
english: Tom won't likely be disrespectful.

japanese: トムは、まるで先生かのような物言いだな。
english: Tom talks as if he were a teacher.

japanese: 私が間違ってると言ってるんですか？
english: Are you suggesting that I'm wrong?

japanese: 豚インフルエンザのことが気に掛かるんですか？
english: Are you concerned about swine flu?

japanese: もう踏ん切りはついたの？
english: Have you already made a decision?

japanese: トムはいつも人の悪口を言ってるんだ。
english: Tom is always bad-mouthing others.

japanese: トムっていつも他人の悪口を言ってるんだ。
english: Tom is always bad-mouthing others.

japanese: 推理小説のファンなんですか？
english: Are you a fan of mystery novels?

japanese: ミステリーファンなの？
english: Are you a fan of mystery novels?

japanese: 借金で首が回らないかい？
english: Are you over your head in debt?

japanese: あまり真面目に受け取らないで。
english: Don't take it too seriously.

japanese: まだトムのこと待つつもり？
english: Are you still going to wait for Tom?

japanese: ご両親は転居されたんですか？
english: Are your parents relocating?

japanese: トムは忙しくてもやってくれる。
english: Even if Tom is busy, he'll do that.

japanese: トムと私、カボチャを彫ったんだ。
english: Tom and I carved pumpkins.

japanese: 毎年、違います。
english: Every year is different.

japanese: こうするのにもいずれ慣れますよ。
english: You'll eventually get used to doing this.

japanese: トムはよくここに入浸っていたんだよ。
english: Tom used to hang out here.

japanese: こっちの方があっちのより安いよ。
english: This one is cheaper than that one over there.

japanese: あそこのより、こっちの方が安いって。
english: This one is cheaper than that one over there.

japanese: あげたお金で足りた？
english: Was the money I gave you enough?

japanese: どうすれば億万長者になれるかな？
english: How can I become a billionaire?

japanese: 寒波への備えはできてる？
english: Are you ready for cold weather?

japanese: トムは金持ち金使わずだ。
english: Tom has short arms and deep pockets.

japanese: 言葉よりも行動が物を言うと思うんだ。
english: I think actions speak louder than words.

japanese: 普段はこういうことはしないよ。
english: I normally don't do things like this.

japanese: トムはほとんどいつも正しいよ。
english: Tom is almost always correct.

japanese: 今、その質問には答えられないんだ。
english: I can't answer that question now.

japanese: トムは友達の家に泊まってるよ。
english: Tom is staying at a friend's.

japanese: 僕は自分のチームをとても誇りに思っています。
english: I'm very proud of my team.

japanese: ありがとうって言いたかった。
english: I wanted to say thank you.

japanese: お礼を言いたかったです。
english: I wanted to say thank you.

japanese: めっちゃドキドキした。
english: I was really nervous.

japanese: すんごい緊張した。
english: I was really nervous.

japanese: トムがそれをしたのはちょうど一ヶ月前です。
english: Tom did that just a month ago.

japanese: サミは誰の話も聞きません。
english: Sami listens to nobody.

japanese: 色を選んで。
english: Pick a color.
